item.title: Ram Dass: Pioneering Spiritual Teacher, Psychedelic Explorer
item.description: Discover the life and teachings of Ram Dass, the influential spiritual teacher who bridged Eastern wisdom and Western psychology. Learn about his transformative journey with psychedelics, his groundbreaking book "Be Here Now," and how he introduced a new understanding of spirituality to the Western world.
item.author: (Psychedelic Bible)

item.title: Timothy Leary: The Psychedelic Pioneer Who Expanded Consciousness
item.description: Explore the life and legacy of Timothy Leary, the controversial psychologist and countercultural icon who advocated for the therapeutic and transformative potential of psychedelic drugs
item.author: (Psychedelic Bible)
